meta.name: James May's Shed Load of Ideas
meta.description: James May tackles our biggest bugbears with inventions in his Wiltshire workshop.

videos.title: Noisy Neighbours
videos.overview: James builds a sound-proof room-within-a-room to tackle noisy neighbours and attempts to fix local Piers' toaster. He also invents 'Cheese Chess'.

videos.title: Traffic Warden
videos.overview: James May is back to help fix Britain's biggest bugbears with simple solutions and ingenious engineering. Today, he builds a traffic warden-warning system.

videos.title: Supermarket Trolley-Bike
videos.overview: James brainstorms a new invention, makes seriously cool clothes and creates an addictive pub game. Elsewhere, a vintage train set needs repair.

videos.title: Fly Tipping
videos.overview: The team make a trap for fly tippers and give Wiltshire its own dartboard. Plus, James invents 'The Herb Hat' for when food needs an extra flourish.

videos.title: Cinema Seat
videos.overview: James, Sim and Tony reinvent cinema seating, attempt to stop cereal going soggy and repair a telescope. They also have an idea for beauty treatments.

videos.title: Recycling Plastic
videos.overview: James, Sim and Tony attempt to recycle milk bottles into a game for the pub, repair Peter's Victorian games box, and invent spray-on crisp flavouring.
